title: MASSIVE CHALICE (2015) PC | [RePack by Azaq]
description:
============================================
MASSIVE CHALICE (2015) PC | [RePack by Azaq]
============================================

Languages: ENGLISH

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

MASSIVE CHALICE is a tactical strategy game set on an epic timeline from
Double Fine Productions. As the Immortal Ruler of the Nation, you'll take
command of its heroes, forge marriages to strengthen your Bloodlines, and
battle a mysterious enemy known as the Cadence in a war lasting hundreds of
years

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

* Bloodline Genetics - MASSIVE CHALICE features an innovative Bloodline
system that allows the player to marry heroes together to produce
children. The Bloodline system uses a randomized genetic code for every
hero. Their children can end up with the best (or worst!)
gameplay-impacting traits of their parents
* Permadeath - The heroes in MASSIVE CHALICE age over the course of the
timeline and eventually pass away. This forces the player to engage in
the beauty of permadeath and always juggle an imperfect party of heroes
with which to do battle!

============================================
RePack Details:                            =
============================================

- Nothing was ripped
- RePacked by Azaq

============================================
Instruction: =
============================================

1. Install the game
2. Play
